title: 龙珠求解！！！
author: Suakur
txt_content:
为什么我简练配置文件里面已经修改成可以飞行可龙珠里面的舞空术一开他还是弹出这个




QQ图片20200614110006.png (33.96 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-6-14 11:02 上传

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
Suakur 发表于 2020-6-14 11:05
恩重启过
那个人感觉可能是简联这个mod的问题了
尝试在本地开服试试吧

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
.minecraft/config/serverGlobalConfig.properties的
allow-flight设为true之后重启过游戏吗

replies.author: Suakur
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-6-14 11:03
.minecraft/config/serverGlobalConfig.properties的
allow-flight设为true之后重启过游戏吗
恩重启过

replies.author: Suakur
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-6-14 11:03
.minecraft/config/serverGlobalConfig.properties的
allow-flight设为true之后重启过游戏吗
#Minecraft Server Properties for LAN.
#For default behaviour :-
#set max-view-distance=0
#set port=0
#You can also delete this(or any properties) file to get it regenerated with default values.
#Sun Jun 14 10:50:51 CST 2020
player-idle-timeout=0
resource-pack=
overrideGlobalDefaults=true
port=0
max-view-distance=0
online-mode=false
spawn-animals=true
max-players=10
pvp=true
allow-flight=true
white-list=false
spawn-npcs=true
max-build-height=256
motd=<\! mc_Star's \u65B0\u7684\u4E16\u754C ON LAN \!>
您看一下
